<Heading
  as={"h1"}

  children={"Create API Key"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api-key"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Create an API key for the user.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"name":{"type":"string","description":"The name of the API key."},"expiresTime":{"type":"number","description":"The expiration days of the API key."}},"required":["name","expiresTime"]}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"201":{"description":"API key created successfully.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"name":{"type":"string","description":"The name of the API key."},"prefix":{"type":"string","description":"The prefix of the API key."},"key":{"type":"string","description":"The key of the API key."},"address":{"type":"string","description":"The address of the user."}}}}}},"400":{"description":"Bad request - max API keys per address reached"},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
